Package com.jgefroh.core

The essential classes and interfaces of the Core framework.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IComponent
    The interface for a Component.
    IEntity
    The interface for an Entity.
    IInfoPack
    Interface for an InfoPack.
    IMessage
    A marker interface for message types.
    IPayload
    A marker interface for message payloads.
    ISystem
    The interface for a System.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractComponent
    A base implementation of IComponent for convenience.
    AbstractInfoPack
    An IInfoPack that acts as an adapter.
    AbstractSystem
    An abstract system that provides basic functionality.
    Core
    The heart of the Core framework.
    Entity
    A default implementation of the IEntity interface.
    LoggerFactory
    Provides an easy way to create an instance-specific logger for debugging.

Package com.jgefroh.core Description

The essential classes and interfaces of the Core framework. This is currently in production, and the API is subject to extreme changes.
Version:
0.7.0
Author:
Joseph Gefroh
